title.narrative: Global Train and Equip Program - Integrated Border and Maritime Security Program

description.narrative: The objective of this program is to build the capacity of the Yemeni MoD and Yemen Coast Guard (YCG) Command and Control elements, YCG district units, and the Yemen Air Force (YAF) by developing an integrated aerial surveillance and ground mobility capability to monitor and interdict threats along Yemens coastline. Equipment provided includes 12 STOL aircraft with ISR capabilities, 100 light tactical vehicles, and communications equipment.

title.narrative: U.S. Department of Defense, Institutional Capacity Building Programs: Defense Institution Reform Initiative

description.narrative: Yemen - USG Institutional Capacity Building Pre-Scoping. Gain abetter understand the Institional Capacity Building environment, problem-set, and future requirements in Yemen. Identify which USG actors have committed projects and funds to Yemen through the next FY.
